div.p: The 5th Annual China PHP Conference – June 17 to 18, Shanghai
We will be hosting a 2-days event filled with high quality, technical sessions about PHP Core, PHP High Performance, PHP Engineering, and MySQL 5.7/8.0 more.
Don’t miss out on 2-great days sessions, delicious food, fantastic shows and countless networking opportunities to engage with speakers and delegates.
Go to www.phpconchina.com for tickets and more information.
